comment_text: The programme is very practical with many projects. You learn a lot but the assignments can be quite intense.
There are many industry talks and alumni sharing sessions. It feels easy to connect with companies.
Rent near campus is not cheap, but food and daily expenses can be controlled if you budget carefully.
Many subjects cover machine learning and deep learning. The content feels up to date with current industry trends.
Lecturers and tutors are generally willing to answer questions. Admin processes can be slow sometimes.
Computer labs and study areas are comfortable, but during exam period it can be hard to find a free seat.
There are many clubs and events. It is easy to meet people from different programmes.
The programme is not easy, but you can see your progress each semester. It is a good choice if you are motivated.
